1469790.name: Nihariely’s Spatial Adventure: Original Soundtrack
1469790.description:
Here is the soundtrack of the game. This is a good omen for the start of the third decade of the 21 century. Is also a gift for those people who bought the game in its first month of release. This DLC could have cost 10$ otherwise or never be released to the public. Please enjoy your new DLC with good headphones.

If you like it, please consider buying the base game.

Notes:
* The music was designed for Headphones in mind.
* Due the nature of the game, the music itself could be a potential spoiler. Is recommended to play the game first.
* Composing music is a job, the fact that this DLC is free does not imply the devaluation of it, it is a gift for the players; please don't dismiss the work of being a composer.

Thanks again and Enjoy!
1469790.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
